actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1986 to limit the non-Federal share of the cost of shore protection projects.
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Community Beaches Protection Act - Amends the Water Resources Development Act of 1986 to prohibit the Secretary of the Interior from soliciting contributions from non-Federal interests for costs of constructing projects or measures for shore protection in excess of the non-Federal share assigned to flood control, nonstructural flood control measures, and certain other project purposes. Provides that such prohibition shall not limit the Secretary's authority to require non-Federal interests to pay the full cost of work performed outside the authorized scope of a project.

titles.title: To amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1986 to limit the non-Federal share of the cost of shore protection projects.
